laboratory_examinations.findings: Negative for toxigenic C. difficile by the Illumigene DNA amplification assay. (Reference Range - Negative)

Findings include: Cardiomegaly with left ventricular enlargement; atelectasis and small pleural effusion; stable hepatic hemangioma and cyst; unchanged cortical irregularity in the right kidney; significant fat stranding and rim enhancing fluid collection consistent with abscess due to perforated appendix.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Stable findings regarding the liver lesions and unchanged renal irregularity since previous CT.
